CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 7, 1941, pg. 18, reads: "Central Baptist Fetes Its Youthful Pastor And Wife" - Words of praise and commendation flowed like water and were as plentiful as the delicious chicken a la king at the banquet Monday night in Central Baptist Church for the Rev. and Mrs. Cornell E. Talley...Bottom Right: Chefs, waiters, waitresses and hostesses enjoy the banquet too. Hostesses in dinner gowns are: Bunny Allen, Tula Woodson, Odessa Smith, Marilla Taylor and Mrs. Major (in black). waitresses are: Mrs. O. Lloyd, Melba Guyton, Dorothy Turner, Gladys Hones, Ross Beatty, Hazel Blue, Matilda Jackson, Lillian Works, Helen Purdy, Annabell Betts, Mell Isenhaur, Annetta Clayton, Agnes Simms, Willa Ellis, Gladys Beverly, Nola Gloater, Sara Darby and Sara Belle Lee.  Chefs are: Norman Burton, Charles Porter and George Oliver, Othur Taylor smiles at the success of the whole affair.  William Woodson is pleased too....Staff photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including hostesses Bunny Allen, Tula Woodson, Odessa Smith, Marilla Taylor and Mrs. Major wearing dark gown; waitresses Mrs. O. Lloyd, Melba Guyton, Dorothy Turner, Gladys Hones, Ross Beatty, Hazel Blue, Matilda Jackson, Lillian Works, Helen Purdy, Annabell Betts, Mell Isenhaur, Annetta Clayton, Agnes Simms, Willa Ellis, Gladys Beverly, Nola Gloater, Sara Darby and Sara Belle Lee; chefs Norman Burton, Charles Porter and George Oliver; and Othur Taylor and William Woodson wearing tuxedos, posed around table in Central Baptist Church for banquet in honor of Rev. Talley
